text: This chiropractic clinic is highly professional. The therapist has excellent techniques, and I felt much more relaxed and refreshed after the session. The environment is clean and comfortable, and the staff are friendly and attentive. I noticed a significant improvement after just one visit. Highly recommended for anyone with neck, shoulder, or back issues!

Great experience at this TCM! They were knowledgeable and attentive, taking the time to understand my issues before suggesting a treatment plan. I went in with back pain, and after acupuncture and herbal remedies, I felt so much relief. The staff were friendly, and the whole environment was calming and clean. I appreciated that they explained everything clearly and tailored the treatment to my needs. Highly recommend this place to anyone seeking authentic and effective TCM care!

Knowing this tcm upon google.

Upon reaching, the receptionist was friendly. Immediately bring me to the person that doing the massage for me.
The person name angel.
She really did a good job.
Be it from explaining my situation to telling me how to take care to massaging the right point.
Thank you for making the whole massage session wonderful and relieved.
Found above tcm by chance with current promotion of 38 which includes massage and cupping. the services was great! She focuses on the part and trying her best to relieve stiffness of my back.

Went to kinex mall for lunch and just happening walked pass by this TCM and take a trial session, it was so good and the doctor is very professional and senior, the reception is also very friendly, highly recommended
